cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and a pain to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks and the body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Very prone to becoming hard to adjust vertically due to wood dust.
Powerful, quiet, and versatile with a soft start feature. Router is very powerful and runs well without overheating.
Variable speed is great for different size bits and wood types. Good value for money despite some issues with the speed controller.
Fits perfectly on the router table base.
Good value for money despite some issues with the speed controller.
cont.entity_b: Reasonably priced solution for off-site communication.

cont.entity_a: Front spindle bearing retained with screws without a bearing clamp. The router is durable and well-made, with a nice soft start and variable speed. Plastic piece does not fit tightly and could be improved. The Bosch 1617EVS router is reliable and well-designed.
cont.entity_b: Solid small business class router with good features. Sturdy full-featured VPN router with a keep-alive feature.

cont.entity_a: Micro adjustments can be made from the top of the table. Comes with both 1/4" and 1/2" collets. Collet changing is simple, but the dual wrench feature is hard to get used to. The router works well for making tongue and groove joints.
cont.entity_b: Easy VPN setup, but Cisco's support is inadequate. Dual WAN function is helpful for redundant ISPs.
Gets hot and requires plenty of air movement.
Easy to configure with a nice web interface. Setup is intuitive and easy.

Gateway to gateway VPNs drop regularly. VPN tunnels in the router are a great idea but have limitations. Load balancing doesn't work well with secure connections. Does not support XAUTH user credentials. Widely reported issues with VOIP systems.

cont.entity_a: Box was previously opened, and some parts were missing.
